cause.description:
We must tell all hotties and the like to stop being so hot bcoz it is causing GLOBAL WARMING. Their hottness is oozing out of them causing the atmosphere to heat up.. and that is a baddd thing. The hotties that must definately be notified about this are: - Blake Lewis - Johnny Depp - Hrithik Roshan - Justin Timberlake - Ricky Ullman - Brad Pitt - David Beckham - Cristiano Ronaldo - Chad Michael Murray - Oliver James - Zac Efron - Jude Law - Orlando Bloom - Chris Evans - Adam Garcia - Channing Tatum - APPY (wherever he is) & SPONGEBOB (huzever sheets hes under! HAHAH)! hahaha my friendz no hu im talkin abt ;) - Chris Richardson - Milo Ventimiglia - Jesse Mccartney
.... can u add some more?
so STOP THE HOTTNESS GUYS ! - FOR THE SAKE OF THE EARTH!! .. then again - nooo i dont want you to stop being hott. screw the freakkin earth, i wont be alive anyway :P haha jkk..
1. We've only got ONE earth.
2. The hott ppl will still stay hott, they can jus tone it down a lil ;)
3. WHO AM I KIDDING ? SCREW THE EARTH... BRINGG ONN THE HOTTIES! lol
cause.mission: Tell all the hott ppl in the world to.. stop being so hot! coz its freakkin causing global warming!!
cause.name: All the hotties around the world are causing global warming!
